name: Lattice
headline: Modern people management platform.
description: Lattice is people success software that empowers leaders to build engaged and high- performing teams, inspire winning cultures, and make strategic, data-driven business decisions. Our software helps nearly 4,000 companies globally align employees to the most critical objectives, measure and reward performance, and create an effective feedback loop between employees and managers.

founders.name: Eric Koslow
founders.description: Founder of multiple startups. Knows a fair bit about SaaS, video, streaming, VTubers, and doing business in Japan.

You can't afford underperformance or inefficiency — we built Lattice to help you achieve operational excellence across your business.
Our AI-powered people platform transforms company leaders and HR teams into stewards of high performance, data-driven decision making, and meaningful work for every employee.
improve manager PRODUCTIVITY
## More productive managers, higher performing teams
Make managers your highest point of leverage with productive meetings, clear expectations, and accountability.
### [OKRs & GoalsFocus individuals and teams on your company’s top priorities, tracking progress and risks each step of the way.![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ad6f1aef87635bd23449f1/669a81f71991dcf721521b59_ui-okrs-goals-new.webp)](https://lattice.com/</goals>)### [1:1sMake every meeting more productive with auto-suggested agendas and action items.![UI from Lattice showing 1:1s between employees and managers](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ad6f1aef87635bd23449f1/6659b7dcf67b44f2f112ba91_ui-one-ones.webp)](https://lattice.com/</performance/one-on-ones>)### [UpdatesStay in sync, async, with weekly status updates.![UI from Lattice showing employee updates](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ad6f1aef87635bd23449f1/6659b7dc4a52eadf9d10c335_ui-updates.webp)](https://lattice.com/</performance/updates>)
> I love getting notified that my team member received praise so I can bring it up in our next one-on-one.
![Photo of Kyle Teague](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ad6f1aef87635bd23449f1/651bf7d66dfb35365e5b8299_photo-kyle-teague.jpeg)

Simplify People OPERATIONS
## Less paperwork, more people work
Make HR operations refreshingly simple. Our integrations keep your data in sync while AI-powered workflows automate the manual aspects of your employee experience.
### [Compensation Cycle ManagementKeep everyone on the same page for budgeting, decision-making, and consistency.![UI from Lattice showing compensation cycle management](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ad6f1aef87635bd23449f1/6659b7dceb8e13d1da8b5bfe_ui-compensation-cycle-management.webp)](https://lattice.com/</compensation>)### [WorkflowsChampion change with streamlined approvals, tasks, and communications.![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ad6f1aef87635bd23449f1/669a81f7b92836a724f384a0_ui-workflows-new.webp)](https://lattice.com/</hris/workflows>)[78%Lattice reduces administration time by 78% on average.Read the Forrester report![Image of a book cover of "The Total Economic Impact of Lattice", a Forrester report](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ad6f1aef87635bd23449f1/666ad1d15575e3eb3a864c6c_book-forrester.svg)](https://lattice.com/</forrester>)### [Performance ReviewsRun performance cycles 2x faster with insights from across your review period.![UI from Lattice showing performance reviews](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ad6f1aef87635bd23449f1/665f0447bbe777997c122e13_ui-performance-reviews.webp)](https://lattice.com/</performance/reviews>)
ACT ON EMPLOYEE INSIGHTS
## Better data, better decisions
Get real-time data on your workforce, and turn employee insights into action.
### [Engagement SurveysCollect employee feedback and save 20+ hours analyzing the comments for trends that improve productivity and engagement.![UI from Lattice showing engagement surveys](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ad6f1aef87635bd23449f1/6659b7dc877df420dda98230_ui-engagement-surveys.webp)](https://lattice.com/</engagement>)### [Analytics ExplorerDiscover insights to power business strategy. Visualize, compare, and understand any employee record metric.![UI from Lattice showing our analytic explorer](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ad6f1aef87635bd23449f1/6661d58dfab86df952f06eaf_ui-analytic-explorer.webp)](https://lattice.com/</hris>)### [Team AnalyticsUnderstand employee sentiment to ensure everyone can achieve their best work.![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64ad6f1aef87635bd23449f1/669a81f7b92836a724f38498_ui-team-analytics-new.webp)](https://lattice.com/</analytics>)[27%Lattice reduced turnover at Vantage West by 27%Read the story](https://lattice.com/<https:/lattice.com/customers/vantage-west>)

## Lattice: A Comprehensive Overview

### Introduction
Lattice, founded in 2015 and part of Y Combinator's W16 batch, is a modern people management platform located in San Francisco. The company has rapidly established itself as a key player in the HR tech space, boasting a talented team of around 540 employees. Lattice's mission is to empower leaders to cultivate engaged and high-performing teams while enabling data-driven decision-making across organizations.

### What They Offer
Lattice provides a suite of tools designed to enhance employee success and drive organizational performance:

- **Performance Management**: By aligning individual and team goals with company objectives, Lattice helps managers identify top performers and support growth among all employees.
- **Engagement Surveys**: The platform enables organizations to gather feedback, allowing for timely insights that boost employee satisfaction and engagement.
- **Compensation Management**: Lattice aids in developing compensation strategies that not only attract talent but retain it by ensuring fair and competitive pay.
- **Analytics**: Comprehensive data analysis provides organizations with actionable insights to inform strategic decisions.

As of now, Lattice serves nearly 4,000 companies globally, showcasing its versatility across various industries—from tech giants to small businesses.

### The Lattice Experience
The platform stands out for its intuitive and user-friendly design. Lattice integrates employee records, performance tracking, and feedback processes into one cohesive system, significantly reducing administrative burden. In fact, companies have reported an average 78% reduction in time spent on administrative tasks after using Lattice.

### Leadership & Community
Dalton Caldwell, a well-known figure in the tech community, serves as the Group Partner, guiding Lattice's vision. The company prides itself on a vibrant community, notably their "Resources for Humans" network, which connects over 23,000 HR professionals.

### Why Choose Lattice?
The platform’s emphasis on fostering a winning culture makes it appealing to organizations striving for excellence. With features that promote transparency, enhance communication between teams, and quantify employee growth and feedback, Lattice taps into one of the most critical aspects of business success—people.

The consensus from industry reviews highlights Lattice's effectiveness:
- Rated 4.7 on G2.com and 4.5 on Capterra, it is evident that users find tremendous value in its offerings.

### Conclusion
Lattice is not just another HR tool; it's a holistic platform that transforms how organizations manage their most important asset: people. By focusing on engagement, performance, and data, Lattice is helping companies redefine their people management strategies in a modern, efficient way. For anyone looking to improve their organizational culture and employee satisfaction, Lattice presents a compelling solution. 

To explore more, visit their website: [Lattice](https://lattice.com).
